llm_res.rule: The ERC721 interface requires a function 'approve(address _approved, uint256 _tokenId) external payable'.
llm_res.function: The provided contract does not implement 'approve' marked as 'payable'.

llm_res.rule: transferFrom function should return true on success.

MUST trigger when tokens are transferred, including zero value transfers. A token contract which creates new tokens SHOULD trigger a Transfer event with the _from address set to 0x0 when tokens are created.
